B.B0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
B.B0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
B.B1: Compile & feedback upon the total number of AQ zone feature types included in the delivery
B.B2: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new records for AQ zones included in the delivery against previous delivery
B.B2_SHORT: Number of new zones compared to previous report
B.B3: Compile & feedback upon the total number of existing records for AQ zones included in the delivery against previous delivery
B.B3_SHORT: Number of existing zones compared to previous report
B.B4: Compile & feedback upon all reported zones. Feedback report shall include the gml:id attribute, am:inspireId, am:name/gn:GeographicalName/gn:spelling/gn:text & aqd:zoneCode elements as available.
B.B5: Compile & feedback upon the total number of modification to existing for AQ zone feature types included in the delivery, including ./aqd:predecessor information Report if the object xlinked via aqd:predecessor is not found within the current or previous deliveries (aqd:AQD_Zone)
B.B6a: The number of zones designated with coordinates via the ./am:geometry element
B.B6a_SHORT: Number of zones that provides coordinates inside the xml via geometry element
B.B6b: The number of zones designated with coordinates via the ./aqd:LAU element and the ./aqd:shapefileLink element
B.B6b_SHORT: Number of zones that provides coordinates via Local Administrative Units (LAU) element and external shapefile link
B.B7: List of unique combinations of aqd:aqdZoneType, aqd:pollutantCode and aqd:protectionTarget
B.B7_SHORT: Number of unique combinations of zone types, pollutants and protection target
B.B8: All gml:id attributes, am:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
B.B8_SHORT: Internal XML identifiers must be unique (gml:id, base:localId)
B.B9: ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code within namespace
B.B10: ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
B.B10_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
B.B10.1: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
B.B13: /aqd:AQD_Zone/am:name/gn:GeographicalName/gn:language value shall be the language of the name, given as a three letters code, in accordance with either ISO 639-3 or ISO 639-5.
B.B13_SHORT: The geographical language code must correspond to either the ISO 639-3 or ISO 639-5.
B.B18_SHORT: The geographical language text must be a string
B.B20: /am:geometry/gml:Polygon, ./am:geometry/gml:Point, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiPoint, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiSurface, ./am:geometry/gml:Grid, ./am:geometry/gml:RectifiedGrid the srsName attribute shall be a recognisable URN. The following 3 srsNames are expected urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::3035 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4258 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326
B.B20_SHORT: The coordinate reference system for the zones must be defined with a correct uniform resource name
B.B21: /am:geometry/gml:Polygon, ./am:geometry/gml:Point, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiPoint, ./am:geometry/gml:MultiSurface, ./am:geometry/gml:Grid, ./am:geometry/gml:RectifiedGrid, ./am:geometry/gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList the srsDimension attribute shall resolve to "2" to allow the x & y-coordinate of the feature of interest
B.B21_SHORT: The dimension attribute must be given the value "2"
B.B22: ./am:geometry /gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList the count attribute shall resolve to the sum of y & x;coordinate doublets.
B.B22_SHORT: The count attribute must be equal to the Y and X coordinate doublets
B.B23: Check that the coordinates lists in ./am:geometry /gml:Polygon/gml:exterior/gml:LinearRing/gml:posList ar presented in lat / long (y;axis / x;axis) notation.
B.B23_SHORT: The coordinates must be ordered as latitude (y-axis) ,longtitude (x-axis)
B.B25_SHORT: Start time must be less than end time
B.B26: ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition equal to indeterminatePosition="unknown"/ shall indicate the zone is operational.
B.B26_SHORT: If end time is 'unknown,' then the zone is active
B.B27: ./am:designationPeri/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition with valid content (historical content) shall indicate that the zone is no longer operational.
B.B27_SHORT: If end time is displayed, the zone is no longer active
B.B28: ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be a valid historical date for the start of the version of the zone in extended ISO format. If an am:endLifespanVersion exists its value shall be greater than the am:beginLifespanVersion
B.B28_SHORT: End date must be greater than start date, if end date exists
B.B29: ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be LESS THAN OR EQUAL TO ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition ./am:beginLifespanVersion shall be GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO ./am:designationPeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition
B.B29_SHORT: Start date shall be less, or equal to
B.B30: ./am:environmentalDomain shall be a citation via href xlink attribute of http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/MediaValue/air (currently resolves to 404 error)
B.B34: ./am:legalBasis/base2:LegislationCitation/base2:level shall be a citation via href xlink attribute of http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codeList/LegislationLevelValue/[concept] (currently resolves to 404 error)
B.B35: ./aqd:zoneCode shall be a unique code for the zone within the ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace. ./aqd:zoneCode . The value may equal the value at ./am:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId
B.B35_SHORT: Zone code must be unique. The value may e equal the LocalId
B.B36: ./aqd:residentPopulation shall be an integer value GREATER THAN 0 (zero)
B.B36_SHORT: Population must be a value higher than zero
B.B37: ./aqd:residentPopulationYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition shall cite the year in which the resident population was estimated in yyyy format
B.B37_SHORT: Year in which the resident population was estimated must have the format yyyy
B.B38: ./aqd:area the value will be a decimal number GREATER THAN 0 (zero)
B.B38_SHORT: The Area value must be a decimal number, greater than zero.
B.B39a:
The allowed content combination within ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to
Sulphur dioxide (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Sulphur dioxide (air) + vegetation http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V Ozone (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Ozone (air) + vegetation http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
Nitrogen dioxide Nitrogen dioxide (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Nitrogen oxides (air) + eco http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/9 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
Particulate matter < 10 µm (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Particulate matter < 2.5 µm (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/6001 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Carbon monoxide (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/10 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Benzene (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/20 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H Lead in PM10 (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5012 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H Arsenic in PM10 (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5018 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H Cadmium in PM10 (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5014 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
Nickel in PM10 (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5015
B.B39b:
Count number of occurrences across XML and list it as below (it can not be 0)
Sulphur dioxide (1) + health Sulphur dioxide (1) + vegetation Ozone (7) + health Ozone (7) + vegetation Nitrogen dioxide (8) + health Nitrogen oxides (9) + vegetation Particulate matter < 10 µm (5) + health Particulate matter < 2.5 µm (6001) + health Carbon monoxide (10) + health Benzene (20) + health Lead in PM10 (5012) + health Arsenic in PM10 (5018) + health Cadmium in PM10 (5014) + health Nickel in PM10 (5015) + health Benzo(a)pyrene in PM10 (5029) + health One exception: Nitrogen oxides (9) + vegetation can be 0 for Gibraltar
B.B39c: Combination in B39a can not be repeated within individual AQD:Zone
B.B39c_SHORT: List any individual zone with Pollutant/ProtectionTarget combination repeated
B.B40:
IF aqd:reportingPeriod included in the ReportingHeader is equal or greater than year 2015, ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption must resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/none
Only 1 entry is allowed.
Else ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption attribute must resolve to one of concept within http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/…
Multiple entries are allowed.
B.B41: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/NO2 1h OR http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/NO2 annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Nitro gen dioxide Nitrogen dioxide (air) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B41_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is either NO2-1h, or NO2-annual, then NO2 and Protection Target Health must be present
B.B42: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/PM10-24h OR http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/PM10-annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Particulate matter < 10 μm (aerosol) + health http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B42_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is either PM10-24h, or PM10-annual, then PM10 and Protection Target Health must be present.
B.B43: Where ./aqd:timeExtensionExemption resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timeextensiontypes/C6H6-annual at least one combination within ./aqd:pollutants which includes ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode AND ./aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget shall be constrained to Benzene (air) + healt http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/20 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
B.B43_SHORT: Where AQTimeExemption is C6H6-annual, then C6H6 and Protection Target Health must be present.
B.B44:
Where ./aqd:LAU has been used the list of the administrative these shall be checked to ensure they relate to the MS. This must be provided if /aqd:shapefileLink is not provided or am:geometry does not contain geometry.
The value shall be a valid code from the following codelist: http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/common/nuts/ http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/lau1/ http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/lau2/
NUTS, LAU1 or LAU2 codes must belong to the country reporting data. Country ISO code at cdr.eionet.europa.eu/ZZ/eu/aqd/b/…. shall be the same as the codelist: http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/common/nuts/ZZ[concept] http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/lau1/zz/[concept] http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/lau2/zz/[concept] (exception of gb which has lau and nut codeas as uk)
B.B45: ./am:geometry shall not be a href xlink. If geometry is provided via shapefile, please use element aqd:shapefileLink
B.B45_SHORT: Geometry should not be a hyperlink. If provided via shapefile, element aqd:shapefileLink need to be used
B.B46: Where ./aqd:shapefileLink has been used this should return a link to a valid and existing link in cdr (e.g. http://cdr.eionet.europa.eu/es/eu/aqd/b/envurng9g/ES_Zones_2014.shp)
B.B46_SHORT: Where a link is provided, it should refer to an existing and valid shape file in the same folder in the CDR as the XML is uploaded
B.B47:
./aqd:aqdZoneType attribute must resolve to one of concept within http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/[concept]
Currently, these are: http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/noagg or http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/zonetype/agg
B.B47_SHORT: Zone type must be either Agglomeration or Non-agglomeration

C.C0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
C.C0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
C.C1: Compile & feedback upon the total number of AQ Assessment Regime feature types included in the delivery
C.C2: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new records for AQ Assessment Regime feature types included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries.
C.C2_SHORT: Number of new Assessment Regimes compared to previous report
C.C3: Compile & feedback upon the total number of modifications to previously reported AQ Assessment Regime feature types included in the delivery ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
C.C3_SHORT: Number of existing Assessment Regimes compared to previous report
C.C4: All gml:id attributes shall have unique content within the document or namespace
C.C4_SHORT: gml:id must be unique within the XML document
C.C5: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId shall be an unique code for the assessment regime.
C.C5_SHORT: Local Id shall be unique for the assessment regime.
C.C6: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
C.C6_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
C.C6.1: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
C.C7: Each of the number of /aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime records shall contain 1 ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmental Objective records per /aqd:AQD_AssessmentRegime element
C.C7_SHORT: Each Assessment Regime shall have one Environmental Objective element
C.C8: ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute may resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/9 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/6001 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/10 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/20 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5012 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5014 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5015 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5018 http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/5029
C.C8_SHORT: Assessment regimes must be reported all expected pollutants
C.C9: Count on unique pollutants when Assessment regime(s)'s aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute resolve to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/MO
C.C9_SHORT: Count number of Assessment Regimes for pollutants with Monitoring Objetive
C.C10:
Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/1 the 3 elements within ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/ may only resolve to the following combinations
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/hrsAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/daysAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/ALT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/3hAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/CL aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/aMean aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/CL aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/wMean aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V
C.C10_SHORT:
When the pollutant is SO2 then the environmental objective should include one of the following combinations:
The number of hours in exceedence in a calendar year is above the Limit Value for Health. or The number of days in exceedence in a calendar year is above the Limit Value for Health. or The Crtical Level for Vegetation is above the average. or The Alert Threshold for Health is over 3 hours in exceedence.
C.C11:
Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/7 the 3 elements within ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/ may only resolve to the following combinations
aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/TV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/daysAbove-3yr aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LTO aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/daysAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/TV aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/AOT40c-5yr aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LTO aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/AOT40c aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/V or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/INT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/hrsAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/ALT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/hrsAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H
C.C11_SHORT: When the pollutant is O3 then the environmental objective should include one of the following combinations: The Target Value for Health is the Days in exceedance averaged over 3 calendar years. Or The Long Term Objective for Health is the Days in exceedance in a calendar year Or The Target Value for Vegatation is averaged over 5 years. Or AOT40c applies to the Long Term Objective for Vegetation. Or Exceeds the Information Threshhold for Health for the calendar year. Or Exceeds the Alert Threshold for Health in a calendar year.

Where ./aqd:pollutant resolves to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/8 the 3 elements within ./aqd:assessmentThreshold/aqd:AssessmentThreshold/aqd:environmentalObjective/aqd:EnvironmentalObjective/ may only resolve to the following combinations

aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LVMOT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/ALT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/reportingmetric/3hAbove aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/H or aqd:objectiveType xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/objectivetype/LVmaxMOT aqd:reportingMetric xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of
